title: Kylie: intimate & live
creator_contributor_role: Mushroom Records Pty. Limited, production company
description: Join popular Australian performer Kylie Minogue on her recently successful Australian tour. Kylie is recorded live at the Capitol Theatre in Sydney, July 1st 1998 and performs hits from her past (Stock, Aitken and Waterman days) and present career including; "Too far", "What do I have to do?", "Some kind of bliss", "Put yourself in my place", "Breathe", "Take me with you", "I should be so lucky", "Dancing Queen", "Dangerous game", "Cowboy style", "Step back in time", "Say hey", "Free", "Drunk", "Did it again", "Limbo", Shocked", "Confide in me", "Locomotion", "Should I stay or should I go?" and "Better the devil you know". Includes candid interviews with the support crew including costuming, backing vocals and fellow performers.
